AT.name: Real Heroes: Firefighter 3D
AT.description: Stellen Sie sich den Flammen – als Feuerwehr-Neuling, dessen Schicksal es ist, ein Held zu werden. Lernen Sie den Umgang mit dem Rüstzeug Ihres Handwerks und lenken Sie Wasser oder brechen Sie Türen auf. Das Drama wird noch durch ein beeindruckendes Ensemble von Synchronsprechern verstärkt. Werden Sie, was nur Wenige schaffen – ein echter Held!

AU.name: Real Heroes: Firefighter 3D
AU.description: Face the heat on the frontline as you assume the role of a rookie firefighter destined to become a hero on the Nintendo 3DS™. Operate the tools of the trade. Aim jets of water, swing axes and prise open doors. Adding to the already intense drama is an impressive cast of voice actors. Become that rarest of commodities - a real hero!

BG.name: Real Heroes: Firefighter 3D
BG.description: Face the heat on the frontline as you assume the role of a rookie firefighter destined to become a hero on the Nintendo 3DS™. Operate the tools of the trade. Aim jets of water, swing axes and prise open doors. Adding to the already intense drama is an impressive cast of voice actors. Become that rarest of commodities - a real hero!

BE.name: Real Heroes: Firefighter 3D
BE.description: Affrontez les flammes en première ligne dans le rôle d'un pompier débutant qui ne tardera pas à devenir un héros. Servez-vous des outils du métier. Orientez les jets d'eau, brandissez les haches et forcez les portes. Les voix d'acteur ajoutent de l'intensité dramatique au jeu lors des interventions. Entrez dans le club très fermé des vrais héros.

ES.name: Real Heroes: Firefighter 3D
ES.description: Comienza tu carrera como bombero y combate el fuego en primera línea hasta convertirte en un héroe. Maneja las herramientas del oficio. Dirige el chorro de la manguera y usa hachas y palancas. Un impresionante reparto de actores de doblaje aumenta el intenso dramatismo. Conviértete en algo que no se te ofrece a diario: un héroe de verdad.

IT.name: Real Heroes: Firefighter 3D
IT.description: Affronta le fiamme in prima linea assumendo il ruolo di un pompiere neofita destinato a diventare un eroe su Nintendo 3DS™. Afferra gli attrezzi del mestiere, spruzzando acqua su incendi indomabili e sfondando porte. A dare un contributo alla storia già di per sé intensa, c'è un cast di doppiatori impressionante. Diventa un vero eroe!

Aim jets of water, swing axes and prise open doors. Adding to the already intense drama is an impressive cast of voice actors. Become that rarest of commodities - a real hero!

NL.name: Real Heroes: Firefighter 3D
NL.description: Ga de confrontatie aan met een reeks vuurhaarden als beginnende brandweerman met een lotsbestemming. Richt waterstralen, zwaai met bijlen en breek deuren open. Ingesproken dialogen versterken het drama in het spel, tijdens confrontaties met de ene intense situatie na de andere. Word een zeldzaam persoon – een echte held!

NZ.name: Real Heroes: Firefighter 3D
NZ.description: Face the heat on the frontline as you assume the role of a rookie firefighter destined to become a hero on the Nintendo 3DS™. Operate the tools of the trade. Aim jets of water, swing axes and prise open doors. Adding to the already intense drama is an impressive cast of voice actors. Become that rarest of commodities - a real hero!

PT.name: Real Heroes: Firefighter 3D
PT.description: Enfrenta a pressão da linha da frente no papel de um bombeiro novato destinado a tornar-se herói na Nintendo 3DS™. Manuseia as empolgantes ferramentas do ofício. Aponta jatos de água para onde são precisos, brande machados e arromba portas. As vozes dos atores tornam o jogo mais real. Transforma-te no bem mais raro do mundo: um verdadeiro herói!

RU.name: Real Heroes: Firefighter 3D
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. Face the heat on the frontline as you assume the role of a rookie firefighter destined to become a hero on the Nintendo 3DS™. Operate the tools of the trade. Aim jets of water, swing axes and prise open doors. Adding to the already intense drama is an impressive cast of voice actors. Become that rarest of commodities - a real hero!
